effects.display_string:
Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Wildfire Bomb by 3% stacking up to 6 times. 
Wildfire Bomb has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!
Set: When your Winning Streak! ends, your next Raptor Strike deals 400% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Plunderlord's Tricorne of Admiralty

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 4.7 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

Set: When your Winning Streak! ends, your next Raptor Strike deals 400% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10 sec.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 4,211 or your lowest secondary stat by 5,313 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Darkened Tabard of the Arathi
